SGS Floor Solutions provide advice and tailor a floor-maintenance program for most commercial and industrial needs using the chemical-free Twister™ cleaning system.Twister™ uses diamond-infused pads that clean and polish the floor mechanically. Twister™ can be used on common floor surfaces such as terrazzo, natural stone, concrete, vinyl and epoxy. It transforms your dull, worn floors into clean, glossy and brightly polished floors. Twister™ has unique advantages that benefit both the cleaning company and the floor owner. See the Twister™ video for a demonstration.

These are the complete range of twister pad services offered by us



For heavy duty cleaning of worn stone floors to give it a glossy shine and smooth finish.



For removing tiny scratches from the surface which are otherwise left unattended.



For intensive care and polished surface to shine the floors left by the twister white pads.



For maintaining a high gloss on the surface when used regularly in hospitals and public places.



For deep cleaning of uncoated floors in high traffic areas like showrooms, food joints, cinema halls and other areas.



For daily cleaning of uncoated floors in high traffic areas which undergo rigorous vehicular conditions and environment.



For daily cleaning of coated floors for gloss and shine which can be easily achieved by twister purple pads.



A burnish pad for coated floors to prevent scratches to achieve daily restoration and maintenance of coating.
